summary.span: 存储一组整数，共四个，表示一个矩形的位置和大小

span.span: Stores a set of four integers that represent the location and size of a rectangle

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定义一个矩形及其， ，并由表示的左上角属性。A rectangle is defined by its , , and upper-left corner represented by the property. 若要绘制矩形，需要对象和一个对象。To draw rectangles, you need a object and a object. 对象提供方法，和对象将存储的行中，如颜色和宽度的功能。The object provides the method, and the object stores features of the line, such as color and width. 在绘制矩形的单位由和用于绘图对象的图形属性。The units the rectangle is drawn in is determined by the and properties of the graphics object used for drawing. 默认单位为像素。The default unit is pixels. 若要绘制用颜色填充，你需要对象和一个对象派生自如或。To draw a filled with color, you need a object and an object derived from such as or . 对象提供方法和对象提供的颜色和填充信息。The object provides the method and the object provides the color and fill information. 对于更高级的形状，请使用对象。For more advanced shapes, use a object. ## Examples 下面的示例绘制一个具有在其左上角的矩形 （10，10）。The following example draws a rectangle with its upper-left corner at (10, 10). 矩形的宽度为 100，50 的高度。The rectangle has a width of 100 and a height of 50. 第二个参数传递给构造函数指示钢笔的宽度为 5 像素。The second argument passed to the constructor indicates that the pen width is 5 pixels. 当绘制矩形时，触笔上居中显示矩形的边界。When the rectangle is drawn, the pen is centered on the rectangle's boundary. 矩形的边钢笔的宽度为 5，因为所绘制的 5 个像素宽，因此绘制该 1 像素上边界本身，2 个像素绘制内，和 2 个像素绘制在外部。Because the pen width is 5, the sides of the rectangle are drawn 5 pixels wide, such that 1 pixel is drawn on the boundary itself, 2 pixels are drawn on the inside, and 2 pixels are drawn on the outside. 有关笔对齐方式的更多详细信息，请参阅[如何： 设置钢笔的宽度和对齐方式](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-set-pen-width-and-alignment.md)。For more details on pen alignment, see [How to: Set Pen Width and Alignment](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-set-pen-width-and-alignment.md). 下图显示了所得矩形的大小。The following illustration shows the resulting rectangle. 点线显示，其中矩形已绘制如果钢笔的宽度必须被一个像素。The dotted lines show where the rectangle would have been drawn if the pen width had been one pixel. 矩形的左上角的放大的视图显示胖黑色线条在这些点线上居中。The enlarged view of the upper-left corner of the rectangle shows that the thick black lines are centered on those dotted lines. ![笔](~/add/media/pens1.gif "笔")![Pens](~/add/media/pens1.gif "Pens") 该示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.UsingAPen#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.UsingAPen/CS/Class1.cs#21)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.UsingAPen#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.UsingAPen/VB/Class1.vb#21)]

summary.span: 将此 放大指定量。

span.span: Enlarges this by the specified amount.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将放大此矩形，而不是它的副本。This method enlarges this rectangle, not a copy of it. 在这两个方向上沿某个轴被放大矩形。The rectangle is enlarged in both directions along an axis. 例如，如果在 x 轴的 50 被放大 50 通过 50 的矩形，所生成的矩形将为 150 个单位 （原始 50、 负方向，50 和 50 个在加号方向） 保持矩形的几何中心。For example, if a 50 by 50 rectangle is enlarged by 50 in the x-axis, the resultant rectangle will be 150 units long (the original 50, the 50 in the minus direction, and the 50 in the plus direction) maintaining the rectangle's geometric center. ## Examples 下面的示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码会创建和 50 个单位，这两个轴中将其放大。The code creates a and enlarges it by 50 units in both axes. 矩形绘制到屏幕膨胀 （黑色） 之前和之后膨胀 （红色）。The rectangle is drawn to screen before inflation (black) and after inflation (red). [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将放大此矩形，而不是它的副本。This method enlarges this rectangle, not a copy of it. 在这两个方向上沿某个轴被放大矩形。The rectangle is enlarged in both directions along an axis. 例如，如果在 x 轴的 50 被放大 50 通过 50 的矩形，所生成的矩形将为 150 个单位 （原始 50、 负方向，50 和 50 个在加号方向） 保持矩形的几何中心。For example, if a 50 by 50 rectangle is enlarged by 50 in the x-axis, the resultant rectangle will be 150 units long (the original 50, the 50 in the minus direction, and the 50 in the plus direction) maintaining the rectangle's geometric center. 如果任一`x`或`y`为负，结构伸缩相应的方向。If either `x` or `y` is negative, the structure is deflated in the corresponding direction. ## Examples 下面的示例创建结构并将它放大通过 100 个单位 x 轴方向：The following example creates a structure and enlarges it by 100 units in the x-axis direction: [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples/VB/form1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建的副本`rect`、 放大该副本，然后返回放大的副本。This method makes a copy of `rect`, enlarges the copy, and then returns the enlarged copy. 在这两个方向上沿某个轴被放大矩形。The rectangle is enlarged in both directions along an axis. 例如，如果在 x 轴的 50 被放大 50 通过 50 的矩形，所生成的矩形将为 150 个单位 （原始 50、 负方向，50 和 50 个在加号方向） 保持矩形的几何中心。For example, if a 50 by 50 rectangle is enlarged by 50 in the x-axis, the resultant rectangle will be 150 units long (the original 50, the 50 in the minus direction, and the 50 in the plus direction) maintaining the rectangle's geometric center. ## Examples 下面的示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码会创建和 50 个单位，这两个轴中将其放大。The code creates a and enlarges it by 50 units in both axes. 请注意所得矩形的大小 （红色） 是在两个轴的 150 个单位。Notice that the resulting rectangle (red) is 150 units in both axes. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当两个矩形之一为空，这意味着它的所有值均为零，方法返回的矩形的起始点 （0，0） 和高度和非空矩形的宽度。When one of the two rectangles is empty, meaning all of its values are zero, the method returns a rectangle with a starting point of (0, 0), and the height and width of the non-empty rectangle. 例如，如果有两个矩形： A = （0，0，0，0） 和 B = （1，1; 2，2），然后一个的并集，而 B 是 （0、 0; 2、 2）。For example, if you have two rectangles: A = (0, 0; 0, 0) and B = (1, 1; 2, 2), then the union of A and B is (0, 0; 2, 2). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 此示例设计用于 Windows 窗体。This example is designed for use with a Windows Form. 将此代码粘贴到窗体并调用`ShowRectangleUnion`方法时处理该窗体事件，并传递`e`作为。Paste this code into a form and call the `ShowRectangleUnion` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as .
